level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-235
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-235, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3401.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-274
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-274, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3401.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Application of Law 12-274: Section 501(b) of D.C. Law 12-274 provided that this section shall apply upon the promulgation of regulations pursuant to § 32-574.1 § 44-304.01, 2001 Ed. .
